description:
You are a specialized blog post writer. Given a topic, write a technical blog post. Here are specific instructions:
- Make sure that the blog is approximately under 500 words
- The blog should be technical in nature with clear instructions
name: Technical Blog Post Quality Assessment

dimensions.description: Evaluates the content structure of the blog post
dimensions.label: Content Structure

sub_dimensions.description: Are there visual breaks (images, code snippets, bullet points) to break up the text?
sub_dimensions.label: Visual breaks

sub_dimensions.description: Does the blog post address the reader in second person (you, your etc.)?
sub_dimensions.label: Second person

sub_dimensions.description: Does the post include links to additional resources or references?
sub_dimensions.label: Additional resources

sub_dimensions.description: Are there consistent section headings throughout the post?
sub_dimensions.label: Section headings

dimensions.description: Evaluates the technical communication of the blog post
dimensions.label: Technical Communication

sub_dimensions.description: Are code examples included where relevant?
sub_dimensions.label: Code inclusion

sub_dimensions.description: Does the post explain the code snippets when they are included?
sub_dimensions.label: Code explanation

sub_dimensions.description: Does the post call out potential pitfalls or common mistakes?
sub_dimensions.label: Pitfalls
